QuestData.Title: Eye for an Eye
QuestData.Description:
This is it, $p. Now is the time to strike.
Take this shredder and destroy their stronghold. Burn everything to the ground!
Show no mercy. They certainly didn't offer any to all of the innocent civilians they slaughtered in Brennadam!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Prototype Shredder to burn $2oa Warfang Buildings and kill General Blackstone and $4oa Horde Soldiers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Make them pay for what they've done to us.
QuestData.RewardText: I can't believe you actually pulled that off. We may actually stand a fighting chance now!
